griffon.swing.editors

Class PointPropertyEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.beans.PropertyEditorSupport
      • griffon.core.editors.AbstractPropertyEditor
        • griffon.swing.editors.PointPropertyEditor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExtendedPropertyEditor, java.beans.PropertyEditor

    @PropertyEditorFor(value=java.awt.Point.class)
public class PointPropertyEditor
extends AbstractPropertyEditor

    Author:
